oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lloyd notes some personal information about !khannumup (or Petros Willems) including the names of his relations, his place of origin and his wrongful imprisonment. 1) See also 'Memo for Miss Lloyd' (regarding some personal details of 'Petros Willems' and 'Willem') (a copy), 2) This story is found in Book XVI-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !khannumup (or Petros Willems): his personal history
